open

public void open(java.lang.String file,
                 java.lang.String variable)
Open a file from it's filename. This method must be called on the EDT thread. For other use, please use the xcos(String, String) method.

Parameters:
file - the file to open. If null an empty diagram is created.
variable - the variable to decode. If null no decode is performed.

setLastError

public void setLastError(java.lang.String error)
Log a loading error

Parameters:
lastError - the error description

addDiagram

public void addDiagram(java.io.File f,
                       org.scilab.modules.xcos.graph.XcosDiagram diag)
Add a diagram to the diagram list for a file. Be sure to set the right opened status on the diagram before calling this method.

Parameters:
f - the file
diag - the diag

Close a diagram. This method must be called on the EDT thread.

Parameters:

wasLastOpened

public boolean wasLastOpened(java.util.List<org.scilab.modules.gui.bridge.tab.SwingScilabTab> list)
Does Xcos will close or not ?

Parameters:
list - the list to be closed
Returns:
true if all files will be close on tabs close.

getExternalActions

public java.util.List<org.scilab.modules.xcos.actions.ExternalAction> getExternalActions()
Returns:
the external action list

closeSession

public static void closeSession(boolean ask)
Close the current xcos session. This method must be called on the EDT thread. For other use, please use the closeXcosFromScilab() method.

xcos

public static void xcos(java.lang.String file,
                        java.lang.String variable)
Main entry point This method invoke Xcos operation on the EDT thread.

Parameters:
file - The filename (can be null)
variable - The Scilab variable to load (can be null)

closeXcosFromScilab

public static void closeXcosFromScilab()
Close the current xcos session from any thread. This method invoke Xcos operation on the EDT thread. Please prefer using #closeSession() when the caller is on the EDT thread.

warnCellByUID

public static void warnCellByUID(java.lang.String[] uid,
                                 java.lang.String message)
Look in each diagram to find the block corresponding to the given uid and display a warning message. This method invoke Xcos operation on the EDT thread.

Parameters:
uid - A String as UID.
message - The message to display.

updateBlock

public static void updateBlock(java.lang.String h5File)

xcosDiagramToScilab

public static int xcosDiagramToScilab(java.lang.String xcosFile)
This function convert a Xcos diagram to Scilab variable. This method invoke Xcos operation on the EDT thread.

Parameters:
xcosFile - The xcos diagram file
Returns:
Not used (compatibility)

addToolsMenu

public static void addToolsMenu(java.lang.String label,
                                java.lang.String command)
Add a menu into xcos

Parameters:
label - the label to use
command - the callback (as a Scilab executable String)

Parameters:

Parameters:

Returns:
